price_offer.title: Price Offer No
price_offer.about:
Broom Service was founder by Lidor Mamou on 2013
The company employs a team of professionals in a wide variety of house cleaning and maintenance jobs.
Our staff are regular and experienced employees
Our staff are regular and experienced employees who receive a fair and proper reward and all the beneﬁts they receive according to the law.
Our clients are accustomed and well acquainted with the high standard of service used in the best luxury and boutique hotels in Israel and worldwide and we strive to meet this high quality standard.
Our customer satisfaction, high level of service, attention to detail and personal attitude are the foundations on which we base our services.

The company is registered as a legal cleaning company in the Ministry of Industry. License number: 4569

work-contract.inHead:
Broom Service L.M. Ltd Private Company no. 515184208 
 Exclusive Framework Agreement with Tenants/Clients
work-contract.broom_service: Broom Service L.M. Ltd Private Company no. 515184208
work-contract.whereas_info_text: Broom Service L.M. Private Company no. 515184208 (hereinafter: the Company) is a company that provides, inter alia, services of maintenance, supply, and cleaning fortenants in various facilities across the State of Israel.
work-contract.and_whereas_info_text: The Tenant is interested in making an agreement with the Company in order to receive the services requested in this agreement, for the consideration specified in this agreement.
work-contract.and_whereas_2_info_text: The Tenant is aware that in order to receive the service and/or work from the Company, he/she must sign this agreement and comply with all the terms and conditions of this agreement, with no exception, in connection with the service and/or work and/or the materials and/or the products the Tenant is interested in receiving from the Company.
work-contract.parties_hereby_title: Therefore, the Parties hereby agree and declare as follows:
work-contract.intro_txt_1: The introduction of this agreement is an integral part thereof and as binding as all its other provisions.
work-contract.intro_txt_2: Any obligation of the Tenant under this agreement is an addition to any other obligation of the Tenant under other agreements and/or the quotation and/or any applicable law.
work-contract.intro_txt_3: In any case of contrast between the provisions of this agreement and the provisions of any other agreement between the Tenant and the Company and/or the quotation the Tenant submitted to the Company, the provisions of this agreement shall prevail.
work-contract.intro_txt_4: Headings of the sections contained in this agreement are for convenience only and shall not be interpreted to limit or otherwise affect the provisions of this agreement.
work-contract.service_subtitle: The service / work and/or products requested by the Tenant, including their scope, location and commercial terms
work-contract.the_service_txt: The service and/or work requested by the Tenant
work-contract.location_txt: The location in which the service will be provided and/or work will be performed
work-contract.service_delivery_txt: Date on which the service delivery and/or work will begin, and the date on which the service delivery and/or work will end
work-contract.frequency_txt: Frequency of the service and/or work
work-contract.consideration_txt:
Consideration the Tenant will pay the Company, including the payment method and/or payment date 
 Prices does not include vat**
work-contract.hereby_permit_txt: I the undersigned hereby permit Broom Service L.M. Ltd to charge my credit card account (the details of which are listed below) for the services I will receive from the Company, in the amounts and on the dates specified in this agreement between Broom Service L.M. Ltd and me.
work-contract.employees_txt: All the employees of the Company are employed in compliance with the law and the Company provides them with all the benefits to which they are entitled; the Client has no employee-employer relationship with the employees of the Company.
work-contract.tenant_subtitle: Obligations and Statements of the Tenant
work-contract.tenant_txt_1: By signing this agreement, the Tenant declares that he/she fully and voluntarily accepts all the terms and conditions specified in this agreement and may not have any claim and/or demand and/or complaint against the Company in connection with any promise and/or representation and/or correspondence and/or draft and/or presentation, whether done in writing or orally, prior to the signature of this agreement.
work-contract.tenant_txt_2: The right to use this document is personal and non-transferable. Note that it is prohibited to distribute and/or duplicate and/or copy and/or publish this document without prior express permission in writing from the management of the Company.
work-contract.tenant_txt_3: The Tenant states that he/she will fully cooperate with the Company for the performance of the work and/or service the Company should provide, as detailed above in this agreement.
work-contract.tenant_txt_4: The Tenant hereby undertakes not to directly or indirectly (through another company or person) hire the employees of the Company, even if they are no longer employees of the Company and/or after the termination of the agreement between the Parties.
work-contract.tenant_txt_5: All the orders placed by the Tenant in connection with any service and/or work he/she requests shall be governed by the order terms and conditions listed on the website of the Company; the website address is as follows: www.broomservice.co.il
work-contract.tenant_txt_6: This agreement is valid until the notice of a change or cancellation or freeze of any of the parties and in accordance with the company service cancellation procedures.
work-contract.tenant_txt_7: In case of cancellation of a work order after closing the weekly arrangement and up to 24 hours before the date, the tenant undertakes to pay the company 50 percent of the cost of the visit.
work-contract.tenant_txt_8: In case of cancellation of a work order less than 24 hours before the date, the tenant undertakes to pay the company 100 percent of the cost of the visit.
work-contract.company_subtitle: Obligations and Statements of the Company
work-contract.company_txt_1: The Company agrees to perform the work and/or provide the service and/or products devotedly, in a reliable and timely manner and maintain a high standard of service, all pursuant to the dates determined by the Tenant, through suppliers and/or employees and/or sub-contractors working on its behalf. The Company hereby declares that it has the ability and skills to perform the work and/or provide the service and/or products specified in this agreement.
work-contract.company_txt_2: The company undertakes to pay its employees a salary according to law.
work-contract.company_txt_3: The Company undertakes to timely perform the work and/or provide the service, pursuant to the dates determined in this agreement and/or any dates determined by the Tenant in the orders he/she may place through the website of the Company. Reasonable delay in the performance of the work and/or the arrival of any employee of the Company to the Tenant&lsquos address, given the relevant circumstances, may not be deemed breach of this agreement on part of the Company.
work-contract.company_txt_4: The Company hereby states and notifies the Tenant that it may not be held responsible to any cancelation and/or postponement of the work and/or service and/or any delay in the performance of the work and/or service resulting from extraordinary circumstances it cannot control and/or such that derive from force majeure. For the purpose of this section, force majeure is defined as follows: wars, protests, emergencies, conscription (whether partial or full), including conscription of reserve duty forces, including conscription of employees and/or suppliers and/or contractors and/or any representatives of the Company and/or its suppliers, strikes, diseases and/or epidemics, mourning (including national days of mourning), natural disasters, inability to move on the roads, fire, state of preparedness to emergency, and any situation of any kind that the Company cannot control. In any of the aforementioned situations, the Tenant may not have any claim and/or demand and/or complaint against the Company and/or any of its representatives, and the Parties shall schedule the performance of the work and/or service on a later date that would be agreed upon between the Parties.
work-contract.company_txt_5: The Parties hereby agree that this agreement is a framework agreement and that the Tenant will submit to the Company, from time to time, written work orders that shall be deemed integral part of this agreement.
work-contract.company_txt_6: The company is not responsible for any direct or indirect damage, consequential or special, of any kind, that will be caused to the customer and / or any third party as a result of receiving service by the company and its employees or anyone on its behalf.
work-contract.company_txt_7: This agreement is valid for 1 year.
work-contract.general_txt_1: This agreement summarizes and establishes any and all understandings between the Parties; upon signature, no other agreement that was made between the Parties will be in force, and no amendment and/or agreement and/or alteration and/or addition and/or reduction and/or extension and/or waiver in connection with anything related to this agreement may be in force, unless done in writing and signed by the Parties. In case any section, provision or obligation in this agreement is null or unenforceable, all the other provisions of this agreement shall remain in force. No failure or delay by either party in exercising any of its rights under this agreement may be deemed waiver of such rights.
work-contract.general_txt_2: By signing this agreement, the customer agrees to register his details in a database for the purpose of receiving direct mailing of everything.
work-contract.general_txt_3: Addresses of the Parties for the purpose of this agreement are as specified in the introduction of this agreement. Any notice sent by either party to the other, to the aforementioned addresses, shall be deemed effective within 72 hours from its delivery to a post office branch in Israel for registered mail shipment and upon its delivery to the addressee, if it is delivered by hand, or upon receipt of transmission certificate, if it is sent by fax.
work-contract.signed_title: In witness whereas the Parties have signed:
work-contract.draw_signature: Draw Signature with mouse or touch

contract-form.name: Name
contract-form.ca1_1: I, {{name}} (hereinafter: "the Customer"), hereby engage the services of Broom Service L.M Ltd, ID 515184208 (hereinafter: "the Company") under the terms of this Service Agreement and subject to the "General Terms" that apply to all engagements between the parties and are attached hereto as an integral part (hereinafter: "the Agreement").
contract-form.ca1_2: The Agreement consolidates and embodies all understandings, agreements, and promises made between the parties, and the parties commit to doing their utmost to fulfill the Agreement.
contract-form.ca1_3: No understanding, agreement, or promise will be valid unless included in the Agreement.
contract-form.ca3: Service Costs and Payment Terms ("the Compensation")
contract-form.ca3_1: In consideration for the provision of services, the Customer shall pay the Company a recurring monthly payment according to the cost and scope of services consumed in the previous month, plus VAT, to be paid at the time of service delivery or at the latest date on which the services are provided each month, starting from the signing date of this Agreement.
contract-form.ca3_2: In each order, the Customer must leave credit card details for the monthly charge as mentioned. If the Customer chooses to pay by another means, not by credit card, the credit card details will serve as a deposit, and the Customer hereby authorizes that if the payment is not transferred by the 3rd of the following month, the credit card will be charged the amount due for the services provided by the Company, in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement.
contract-form.ca3_3: Upon signing this Agreement, the Customer's credit card will be charged 1 ILS (one shekel) to verify the credit card's validity. The card will be charged 1 ILS and refunded the same amount immediately afterward to confirm its validity.
contract-form.cc_declaration: I, the undersigned, hereby authorize the Company to charge the credit card, the details of which are specified here, for the services I will receive from the Company in the amounts and on the dates according to this Agreement between me and the Company.
contract-form.add_cc_click_here1: After adding a new credit card, you can choose an existing card from the list below or opt to add another credit card for payment.
contract-form.cc_compensation: The compensation is for the services as described above. Additional services that may be added in the future (if and as required) will be charged according to an additional service agreement to be made between the parties in advance.
contract-form.ca3_4: All the aforementioned amounts will be subject to legal VAT, against which a valid tax invoice will be issued to the Customer.
contract-form.direct_mail_declaration: By checking this box, the Customer agrees to register their details in the Company's database and to receive direct mail of any advertisement and updates from the Company through various media (including email, SMS, social networks, etc.);
contract-form.direct_mail_note: If this box is not checked, only notifications related to services and/or price quotes and/or agreements and/or payments will be sent, and no advertisements will be sent.
contract-form.gt1: Business Day – means a day when banks are open in Israel. The Agreement – any service agreement signed by the parties, including these General Terms. The Services – any work the Company will provide to the Customer under any contract or agreement.
contract-form.gt2: The parties declare and commit as follows: (a) There is no legal, contractual, statutory, or other prohibition preventing them from entering into this Agreement and fulfilling all their obligations towards the other party; (b) The Company will provide services only according to and in accordance with the provisions of the Agreement and without deviation from it and according to the schedules determined by the Customer in this Agreement or from time to time through the personal area on the Company's website; (c) They commit to doing their utmost to fulfill the Agreement and cooperate with the Company for the provision of services; (d) The Company declares that it is licensed by the Ministry of Economy to provide cleaning services; (e) All employees employed by the Company are employed according to the law and subject to the Cleaning Industry Expansion Order; (f) This Agreement is without a time limit unless canceled by either party in accordance with the cancellation provisions below.
contract-form.gt3: The Company is not responsible for any direct or indirect, consequential, or special damage of any kind that may be caused to the Customer and/or any third party as a result of receiving the services by the Company and/or its employees and/or anyone on its behalf. Without derogating from the above, it is clarified that the Company will not be responsible for any damage and/or financial expense and/or loss caused as a result of an act or omission by the Customer and/or anyone on their behalf. A reasonable delay under the circumstances in the provision of services and/or the non-arrival of any of the Company's employees at the Customer's address will not be considered a breach of the Agreement by the Company and will not entitle the Customer to any compensation. The Company will make every effort to provide an alternative worker to provide the services or offer the Customer an alternative date for the provision of services. Without derogating from the above, the Company and/or anyone on its behalf will not be responsible for any damage caused to the Customer and/or delay in the provision of services and/or cancellation of services resulting from force majeure or circumstances beyond their control, including war, strike or lockout, mobilization of the Company's employees and/or suppliers and/or contractors and/or anyone on its behalf and/or its various suppliers, sabotage, public order disturbances, act or omission of a third party or restrictions imposed by it, laws, regulations, orders, or other government directives, security restrictions, epidemic, or other circumstances beyond its control that prevent it from fulfilling its obligations. The Company will inform the Customer of such force majeure circumstances and will do its best to minimize the damage caused.
contract-form.gt4: The Agreement and all matters arising from it will be governed solely by the laws of the State of Israel, and the competent courts in the Tel Aviv district will have exclusive jurisdiction over the Agreement and all matters arising from it, to the exclusion of any other court.
contract-form.gt5: If, by law, any other tax must be paid and/or added to these amounts, it will be paid by the Customer. Any amount not paid to the Company on time will bear late interest and collection costs at the maximum rate allowed by law from the due date until its actual payment. It will be clarified that in the event of a late payment to the Company, the Company will be entitled to postpone the agreed schedule for the provision of services.
contract-form.gt6: It is emphasized that if the Customer uses the services of another provider in the field of services provided by the Company, the Company will not bear any responsibility for damage caused by the work of the other service provider. The Company reserves the right to use its employees and/or the services of a third party to perform the work under the Agreement (outsourcing), and the Customer will have no claim in this regard. The Customer will not be entitled to employ and/or make any contact with any of the Company's employees, including any third party if the Company uses its services as mentioned, not as part of the provision of services, for 12 months from the end of the engagement without the Company's prior written approval.
contract-form.gt7: Upon signing the Agreement, the Customer will be provided with login details to the personal area on the Company's website at crm.broomservice.co.il, which allows convenient access to view and receive information about the services purchased and the ability to perform certain actions, including scheduling and tracking the provision of services, making payments, contacting the Company, and more. Use of the personal area and the website is subject to the regulations and terms of use appearing on the website.
contract-form.gt8: It is hereby agreed that the relationship between the Company and the Customer will be that of a Customer-Independent Contractor, and that the Company's status for all intents and purposes is that of an independent contractor within the meaning of the Contractors Law, 1974. There will be no employment relationship between the Customer and the Company and/or its employees and/or agents and/or anyone on its behalf.
contract-form.gt9_title: Termination of Engagement and Service Cancellation.
contract-form.gt9_1: The parties will have the right to terminate the engagement in this Agreement by giving written notice to the other party up to the weekly scheduling closure date, which occurs every Thursday ("the cancellation date"). In the event of service cancellation after the cancellation date and up to 24 hours before the scheduled service date, the Customer will be charged 50% of the value of the canceled services.
contract-form.gt9_2: In the event of cancellation less than 24 hours before the scheduled service date, the Customer will be charged the full value of the canceled services.
contract-form.gt9_3: Additionally, non-payment and/or delayed payment by the Customer to the Company of the amounts stated in the Agreement for more than 5 business days will give the Company the right to terminate the Agreement immediately, without prejudice to its right to receive compensation that has not yet been paid.
contract-form.gt10: (a) This Agreement consolidates and embodies all the agreements, representations, and promises made between the parties prior to its signing, and no agreement, representation, or promise will be valid unless included in this Agreement itself. (b) Any change to this Agreement will be in writing and with the agreement of the parties. (c) The parties' addresses for the purposes of this Agreement are as specified in the introduction to this Agreement, and any notice sent by one party to the other to these addresses will be considered as received within 72 hours of its delivery for mailing by registered mail and upon delivery, if delivered by hand, and upon receipt confirmation if sent by fax; (d) If any provision of the Agreement and/or the General Terms is unenforceable and/or contrary to the law and/or expired and/or unenforceable, the Agreement and the General Terms will continue to be executed, and the unenforceable provision and/or contrary to the law and/or expired and/or unenforceable will be considered void.

worker_contract.employee_text: the Employee is interested in being employed by the Company, under the terms and stipulations set forth in this contract
worker_contract.and_whereas_info_text: The Tenant is interested in making an agreement with the Company in order to receive the services requested in this agreement, for the consideration specified in this agreement.
worker_contract.and_whereas_2_info_text: The Tenant is aware that in order to receive the service and/or work from the Company, he/she must sign this agreement and comply with all the terms and conditions of this agreement, with no exception, in connection with the service and/or work and/or the materials and/or the products the Tenant is interested in receiving from the Company.
worker_contract.compant_text: the Company is interested in employing the Employee, under the terms and stipulations set forth in this contract
worker_contract.both_party_text: the parties wish to arrange the employment terms of the Employee with the Company, in a written personal employment contract, to which no terms of any collective agreement whatsoever shall apply
worker_contract.term_condition: Therefore it was declared, stipulated and agreed between the parties as follows:
worker_contract.heading_1_1: 1.1 The preamble to this agreement and the appendixes thereto, whether attached to the agreement or not, constitute an inseparable part thereof and are as binding as its other terms.
worker_contract.heading_1_2: 1.2 The titles in this agreement are for orientation and convenience purposes only, are not fundamental stipulations and shall not serve in its interpretation.
worker_contract.heading_1_3: 1.3 This agreement replaces any previous agreement or memorandum, whether oral or written.
worker_contract.heading_2_1: 2.1 The Employee undertakes towards the company to work in the Company as a foreman and maintenance manager, and the Company undertakes towards the Employee to employ him in the Company, all subject to the provisions of this personal employment contract
worker_contract.heading_3_1: 3.1. The Employee’s employment term in accordance with this contract is as of 26-02-2023
worker_contract.heading_4_1: 4.1. The termination of this employment contract, the expiry of its validity and the employment of the Employee in accordance therewith shall be done by giving notice by each party, in advance and in writing in accordance with the stated in the Advance Notice for Dismissal and Resignation Law, 5761-2001.
worker_contract.heading_4_2: 4.2. Throughout the advance notice term, the Employee shall be paid his regular salary and all accompanying benefits in accordance with the contract
worker_contract.heading_4_3: 4.3. If the Company has given the Employee an advance notice regarding the termination of his employment – it shall be entitled to instruct him to not show up at work during the advance notice term, and to pay him all amounts which would have been due to him had he worked during the advance notice term, subject to returning the car, telephone, laptop and any other equipment he has received from the Company.
worker_contract.heading_4_4: 4.4. Despite the foregoing, the Company shall be entitled to terminate the term of this contract and the Employee’s employment in accordance therewith immediately, without giving severance pay and without any advance notice, in case of a founded suspicion that the Employee has performed and action and/or omission of a criminal nature and/or the Employee has breached the duty of care towards the Company and/or the Employee has been grossly negligent in performing his work for the Company, and/or if the Employee has refused to correct any breaching of the agreement after being given an extension of 14 days and/or a shorter extension, as the case may be, to do so, or if he has fundamentally breached the agreement. In this case, all of the Company’s undertaking towards the Employee in accordance with this contract and/or by any law shall terminate immediately
worker_contract.heading_5_1: 5.1. The Company shall employ the Employee, and the Employee undertakes to work for the Company as a foreman and maintenance manager
worker_contract.heading_5_2: 5.2. The description of the Employee’s roles, his fields of occupation and his authorities shall be determined from time to time by the Company management, throughout the agreement term, as it is defined hereinafter:
worker_contract.heading_5_2_2: 5.2.2 Working to the satisfaction of the Company’s clients and at the Company’s standards.
worker_contract.heading_5_2_3: 5.2.3 Responsibility and keeping the Company’s equipment and the cleaning materials which the Company shall provide the Employee.
worker_contract.heading_6_1: 6.1 The Employee’s work days and working house shall be as follows: at most: Sunday to Thursday, about 9 hours a day.
worker_contract.heading_7_1: 7.1 The Employee undertakes towards the Company as follows:
worker_contract.heading_7_1_1: 7.1.1 To fill his position diligently, skillfully and with dedication, for the effective and true performance of his work, for the benefit of the Company and for promoting its business, to use all of his skills, knowledge and experience for the Company’s benefit and to act in complete loyalty towards the Company.
worker_contract.heading_7_1_2: 7.1.2 To not place himself in any way whatsoever in a state of conflict of interests with the Company and/or with anyone on its behalf, and in any such situation, or when there is reasonable concern that such a situation might occur – to immediately report it to his superiors.
worker_contract.heading_7_1_3: 7.1.3. To not make any use whatsoever in the Company’s knowledge for the benefit of his personal business, or for the benefit of others.
worker_contract.heading_7_1_4: 7.1.4. To not receive from any other person or body, throughout his employment by the Company, any benefit, direct or indirect, pertaining to his work for the Company, directly or indirectly.
worker_contract.heading_7_1_5: 7.1.5. The Employee irrevocable undertakes that throughout the agreement term and for 18 months after its termination, he shall not approach by himself and/or by anyone on his behalf, any of the tenants and/or managers of the sites and/or any of the suppliers and/or any of the previous and/or current and/or future Company clients in order to offer the service and/or work which is the subject of this agreement, and he hereby confirms that he is aware that the sites and/or tenants which shall be supplied to him for the purpose of providing the service by the Company are bound by an exclusive agreement with the Company, and that for breaching the stated in this clause he shall pay the Company a pre-agreed and pre-known compensation at a total of 1,000,000 ILS. The parties agree that the amount of the aforementioned pre-agreed compensation has been set by them in agreement, while taking into account the effort and work and/or expenses invested by the Company in order to achieve exclusivity pertaining to the performance of the service and/or work in the sites and/or with the tenants given to the Employee by the Company. The Employee declares and agrees to the foregoing and he hereby waives any argument and/or claim and/or complaint and/or request against the Company in this regard. This clause is a fundamental clause in the agreement. Breaching this clause shall constitute a fundamental breaching of the agreement, and shall grant the Company an unlimited right, at its sole discretion, to terminate the agreement immediately, without detracting from any other relief available to it in accordance with the agreement, including its right to a pre-agreed compensation and/or by any law.
worker_contract.heading_7_1_6: 7.1.6. To keep in complete confidentiality the Company’s business, and avoid competing with it in any way whatsoever – as set forth in this contract hereinafter.
worker_contract.heading_7_1_7: 7.1.7. The aforementioned provisions do not detract from the Employee’s duties of care towards the Company, by any binding law.
worker_contract.heading_7_1_8: 7.1.8. The Employee hereby declares towards the Company that his engagement in this contract does not breach any contract, arrangement or understanding between the Employee and a third party, expressly or implicitly
worker_contract.heading_7_1_9: 7.1.9. The Employee hereby declares that all details he has given the Company upon presenting his candidateship for working at the Company, including his professional experience and his health condition, are complete, true and accurate as of signing this contract. The Employee shall notify the Company regarding any change to his health, shall perform all medical tests which the Company shall require, and shall provide the Company with all medical documents which shall be required by it. In addition, the Employee undertakes to be insured throughout this contract term by one of the known HMOs.
worker_contract.heading_7_1_10: 7.1.10. The Employee shall work only for the Company, and shall not perform, directly and/or indirectly, for pay and/or for any other consideration and/or for no consideration, any other and/or accompanying work, partial and/or full time, unless he has received the Company’s pre-written agreement.
worker_contract.heading_7_1_11: 7.1.11. The Employee shall devote all of his working hours and the best of his knowledge and skills for the purpose of performing his work in accordance with this contract
worker_contract.heading_7_1_12: 7.1.12. In light of the nature of the Employee’s work, and since it is impossible to supervise working house, the provisions of the Working and Resting Hours Law, 5711-1951, shall not apply, and the Employee shall work as required.
worker_contract.heading_8: 8. Scope of the position and salary
worker_contract.heading_8_1: 8.1. The Employee’s total daily salary (gross) (hereinafter: “the Salary”) shall be a total of 40 ILS per working hour, in addition to travel expenses.
worker_contract.heading_8_2: 8.2. The Employee shall work full-time on a daily basis. For the purpose of this agreement, “full-time” means 5 days a week, at least 8 hours a day, and in total, 45 weekly working hours by law, as well as Fridays as necessary. The Employee undertakes to not work, throughout the agreement term and up to 18 months after having finished working for the Company, for a company and/or body competing with the Company’s business, and/or any service provider of any sort and type whatsoever, in sites and/or buildings and/or areas where the Company provides its services
worker_contract.heading_8_3: 8.3. The salary payment shall be done every month, no later than nine days from the end of the calendar month for the Employee’s work during the previous month, to the Employee’s bank account and/or by a check which shall be given to him.
worker_contract.heading_8_4: 8.4. The Company shall deduct from the Employee’s salary all mandatory payments it is required to deduct, including income tax, national insurance and health tax or any other payment which shall apply from time to time to the employer’s payment to the Employee, all as set by law and/or the relevant regulations.
worker_contract.heading_8_5: 8.5. The Employee shall not be entitled to receive any additional consideration or payment, of any type whatsoever, beyond the aforementioned consideration, which summarizes all payments and benefits to which the Employee is entitled for his work in the Company, apart from bonuses to which the Employee is entitled
worker_contract.heading_8_6: 8.6. The Employee shall not work overtime, as this term is defined in the Working and Resting Hours Law, 5711-1951, unless required to do so by the Company or if the Company has given him an express written permission to do so. If the Employee has not received such a permit, or alternatively, has acted contrary to the Company’s prohibition to work overtime, he shall not be entitled to any payment for it, even if he has actually worked those hours.
worker_contract.heading_9_1: 9.1 The Employee shall be entitled to annual leave days in accordance with the Annual Leave Law, 5711-1951. The dates of the holiday shall be set by the Company, as much as possible with coordination with the Employee
worker_contract.heading_10_1: 10.1. The Employee shall be entitled to sick leave as set forth in the Sick Pay Law, 5736-1976.
worker_contract.heading_11_1: 11.1. The Employee shall be entitled for convalescence pay as set forth in the extension order regarding convalescence pay.
worker_contract.heading_12_1: 12.1. The Company shall allocate to the Employee as an employer allocates for compensation and pension, amounts which shall be no less than the rate set by law
worker_contract.heading_13_1: At the end of the Employee’s second year of employment at the Company, the Employee shall join a study fund of his choice (hereinafter: “the Fund”). The Company shall transfer to the Fund 5% of the effective salary. The Company shall deduct from the Employee’s effective salary 2.5% and shall transfer it to the Fund. The allowances to the Fund shall be done by law and in accordance with the Fund’s rules. The Employee shall notify the Company in advance which Fund he has chosen. In case he shall fail to notify as stated, he shall be automatically joined, without a pension marketing proceeding, to a study fund with which the Company shall have a “multiple agreement” at the time, which enables the manages or the arrangement employed by the Company, to add employees without a pension marketing proceeding. The Employee shall be entitled, at any point thereafter, to choose to transfer monies allocated to the Fund, to any other fund of his choice.
worker_contract.heading_14_1: 14.1. The Employee hereby undertakes that in any case of terminating his employment by the Company, whether by dismissal or resignation, whether given an advance notice or not, he shall immediately deliver and/or return to the Company all property, documents, letters, records, reports and all other documents in his possession pertaining to the Company or its business or related thereto, which have arrived in his possession during his employment for the Company in accordance with this contract.
worker_contract.heading_14_2: 14.2. The Employee undertakes that in any case of terminating his employment by the Company, for any reason whatsoever, he shall transfer his job to whomever the Company chooses, in an orderly manner and in accordance with procedures which shall be set and/or given to him, in a proper and thorough manner, so that anyone replacing the Employee shall be able to perform his job in an orderly manner and without causing the Company any damage.
worker_contract.heading_15_1: 15.1. The stated in this clause hereinafter does not detract from the duties of confidentiality applying to the Employee by any law.
worker_contract.heading_15_2: 15.2. It is brought to the Employee’s knowledge, that keeping the Company’s business secret is a key condition for the Company’s success and its ability to compete
worker_contract.heading_15_3: 15.3. In light of the stated, the Employee undertakes, that during his employment for the Company he shall keep in complete confidentiality any information, as it is defined hereinafter, which shall arrive in his knowledge or possession, during his employment for the Company, shall not deliver it to any other person or body, whether directly or indirectly, whether for consideration or for no consideration. In addition, the Employee undertakes to not make any use whatsoever of such information for his benefit and/or for the benefit of others, whether related to him or not.
worker_contract.heading_15_4: 15.4. “Information” for the purpose of this contract, means – any information, whether oral or written or in any other form of recording (including magnetic film, computer records on optic discs and such) referring or pertaining to the Company, directly or indirectly, including its business, procedures and methods of production, research, development plans, sales marketing; and without detracting from the foregoing:
worker_contract.heading_15_5: 15.5. Details about the Company’s clientele, its suppliers and/or employees, names of partners and their rights in the Company, distribution list, products, preparations, processes, systems, software, hardware, prices, knowledge, discoveries and such, which the Company has a right over their knowledge or which are in its possession and have been given to the Employee’s knowledge or have arrived to his knowledge randomly and/or due to and/or during his work for the Company.
worker_contract.heading_15_6: 15.6. Details about suppliers and producers with whom the Company has ties, and their products and/or prices, details about the Company’s clients in Israel and abroad and all of the Company’s business with them and/or in general, details about the method of pricing, the prices of products and/or service and/or works provided by the Company and the services provided by it, methods of operation, organization structure and management of the Company’s actions, financial reports and financial data, Company bank accounts and its financial state as well as the scope of sales, the Company’s incomes and expenses, details about the Employee’s salary and his terms of employment at the Company (unless he is required to do so by an authority entitled to receive such information by law, or for his legitimate personal needs) as well as the salary and terms of employment of other employees at the Company, which have been given to him or have arrived at his knowledge in any way whatsoever.
worker_contract.heading_15_7: 15.7. The Employee is aware the breaching his undertaking for confidentiality in accordance with this clause might cause the Company severe damage.
worker_contract.heading_15_8: 15.8. The Employee undertakes to keep secret the terms of this contract. Both during his employment for the Company and after he stops working for the Company for any reason whatsoever.
worker_contract.heading_15_9: 15.9. The Employee undertakes that both throughout his employment for the Company in accordance with this contract, and for a period of 18 months thereafter, beginning on the day of the termination of his employment for the Company for any reason whatsoever, he shall not do by himself, and shall not be a partner, owner, shareholder, manager, employee, consultant and/or hold any other position or any other part, in any business (whether in the framework of a corporation or not) competing with the Company, its activity and its business or any part thereof.
worker_contract.heading_15_10: 15.10. “Competition” for the purpose of this contract, means – whether the competition exists upon signing this contract, or it shall exist at the time of performing the prohibited act by the Employee, including placing the Employee at a position of being interested in competing activity
worker_contract.heading_16_1: It is hereby clarified that this agreement is a personal and special agreement which arranges the relationship between the Company and the Employee, and exclusively sets the terms of employment of the Employee by the Company. The parties agree that the general and/or special collective agreements including their appendixes, including other agreement which are made from time to time between the employers and the Histadrut and/or agreements between the Company and any of its employees, shall not apply to the Employee.
worker_contract.heading_17_1: 17.1. This contract contains, embodies, merges and expresses all terms agreed upon between the parties, regarding the Employee’s employment by the Company. No promise, guarantee, written or oral agreement, undertaking or presentation regarding the subject of this contract, given or made by the parties prior to signing this contract and which have not been expressly set forth therein, shall not add to the undertakings and rights set forth in this contract or pursuant thereto, detract from them or change them
worker_contract.heading_17_2: 17.2. A change of any provision in this contract or waive of any of the rights set forth and/or pursuant thereto shall be invalid unless done in writing and signed by the party towards which the change or waive is claimed.
worker_contract.heading_18_1: 18.1. The unique and exclusive jurisdiction to discuss claims regarding this agreement, is given to the Labor Court in Tel-Aviv – Jaffa.
worker_contract.heading_19_1: 19.1. Notices in accordance with this agreement or pertaining thereto shall be hand-delivered or sent via registered post.
worker_contract.heading_19_2: 19.2. The date of delivery of notices delivered by hand shall be the day of the hand delivery. The date of delivery of notices which shall be sent via post to the addresses at the top of this agreement, or other addresses which shall be notified, shall be the third day after they are handed to Israeli post. A notice which shall be sent by fax shall be binding upon its receipt by the addressee. In case of delivery by fax, the notice shall be considered to have been duly received only after a business day from the time on which a telephone confirmation was received regarding the receipt of the stated fax notice.
worker_contract.company_greet: The Company wishes the Employee success in his job, fulfillment and meeting all challenges awaiting him in his work for the Company.
worker_contract.in_witness: In witness whereas the Parties have signed:
worker_contract.draw_signature: Draw Signature with mouse or touch

form101.title: Form 101
form101.employee_card: Employee card - and a request for tax relief and coordination by the employer according to the Income Tax Regulations (deduction from salary and wages), 1993
form101.declare_week: This form will be filled out by each employee upon starting his job, as well as at the beginning of each tax year (unless the manager has approved otherwise). The form is a reference for the employer to provide tax relief and to make tax adjustments in the calculation of the employee's salary. If there is a change in the details - this must be declared within a week.
form101.notes_1: Fill out the form and at the bottom of the page you can Download a PDF file with the details you filled out. The file you will receive is a normal and standard Form 101.
form101.notes_2: Send the form by email to you and the employer.
form101.notes_3: Save a draft of the form and continue later.
form101.notes_4: The form is a free service operated by the Broom Service and not operated by the Tax Authority and is not approved by it.
form101.notes_5: Note! If your employer uses a different system for forms 101 - you must fill out the form there. It is recommended to check with the employer.
form101.notes_6: Your privacy is important to us. We do not use your information and do not transfer it to third parties.
form101.year_2023_details: (The form can only be filled out for the current tax year. Except in the month of December, when the form can also be filled out for the next tax year and in the month of January, when the form can be filled out also for the previous tax year, for the benefit of employees who did not have time to fill out the form in time.)
form101.cop_member: Member of a kibbutz / cooperative session
form101.children_headline: C. Details of my children who have not yet turned 19 in the tax year
form101.child_custody: The child is in my custody
form101.child_insurance: I receive child benefit for him from the National Insurance
form101.employer_income_details: D. Details of my income from this employer
form101.do_commencement: Date of commencement of employment in the tax year
form101.if_income_no: I have no other income including scholarships
form101.if_income_yes: I have other incomes as follows
form101.text_credit1: I would like to receive credit points and tax rates against this income (section d). I do not receive them in any other income
form101.text_credit2: I receive credit points and tax brackets on other income and therefore I am not entitled to them against this income
form101.text_excretion1: There are no provisions made for me to a further education fund in respect of my other income, or all employer contributions to a further education fund in respect of my other income are attached to my other income.
form101.text_excretion2: There are no provisions for pension/disability insurance/compensations for my other income, or all employer contributions for pension/disability insurance/compensations for my other income are included in my other income
form101.year_changes_details1: This section, which is a part of the printed 101 form, is irrelevant here because this is a digitized form. You're required to inform the employer of any change that occurs in the details entered in this form, within seven days from the date of the change, by submitting a new form in this system or by any other means allowed by the employer.
form101.year_changes_details2: For any change that will apply to the details you filled in the form, the employer must be notified within one week of the date of the change, by filling out a new form in this system or by any means the employer allows
form101.exemption_headline: G. I am requesting an exemption or tax credit for the following reasons
form101.exm1: 1. I am a resident of Israel
form101.exm3: 3. I am a permanent resident of a qualifying settlement. Me and my first degree family members, live in the settlement and I don't have another life center
form101.exm5: 5. For my spouse who lives with me and has no income in the tax year (Only if the employee or spouse has reached retirement age or he/she is disabled or blind according to section 9(5) of the ordinance)
form101.exm6: 6. I am a parent in a single-parent family living separately from the National Insurance Institute (in accordance with section 7 below) and does not run a joint household with another individual
form101.exm7: 7. In respect of my children listed in part C (To be filled out only by a parent in a single-parent family who receives the children's allowance for them, or by a married woman or by a single parent)
form101.exm8: 8. For my children (To be filled in by a parent (with the exception of a parent mentioned in paragraph 7 above), an unmarried woman whose children are not in her custody, as well as a single parent)
form101.exm9: 9. I am a single parent to my children in my custody (listed in section 7 and 8 above)
form101.exm10: 10. Regarding my children who are not in my possession listed in part C and I participate in their finances (To be filled out by a parent who lives separately, who is not entitled to credit points for his children, who created a PSA requiring him to pay child support)
form101.exm11: 11. I am a parent of children with disabilities who have not yet turned 19, for whom I receive a disabled child benefit from the National Insurance Institute (My partner does not receive these credit points. My children, for whom I am requesting the credit points, have no income this year)
form101.exm12: 12. In respect of alimony for my former spouse (To be filled in by the person who remarries)
form101.exm13: 13. I or my partner have turned 16 and have not yet turned 18 in the tax year
form101.exm14: 14. I am a discharged soldier / served in national service
form101.exm15: 15. In respect of graduation for an academic degree, graduation from an internship or graduation from professional studies
form101.coordination_no: No, I don't have cordination number
form101.no_income_beginning: I had no income from the beginning of the current tax year until I started working for this employer.
form101.additional_income_beginning: I have additional income from salary as detailed below.
form101.accessor_approved: The assessor approved coordination according to the attached certificate.
form101.such_proof: Such as: border police approval for staying abroad, illness approval, etc. In the absence of proof, contact the assessor. Please note: maternity benefits and unemployment benefits are taxable income.
form101.additional_income_details: Details of additional income (ie, in addition to income from this employer)
form101.tax_to_slip: The tax deducted (According to the slips)
form101.disclaimer_details1: I declare that the details I provided in this form are complete and correct. I know that omitting or providing incorrect information is a violation of the Income Tax Ordinance.
form101.disclaimer_details2: I undertake to inform the employer of any change that will apply to my personal details and the details above within a week from the date of the change.
form101.sendTOYouAndEmployer: Send the form to you and the employer
form101.PhotoCopyResident: Photocopy of residence permit in Israel for a foreign employee
form101.myIncomeTrandfer: My income from this employer is transferred to the Kibbutz
form101.receiveTaxCredit: Receives tax credits at other income
form101.requestReceiveTax: I request to receive tax credits and tax bracket for this income (section D). I do not receive them against any other income.
form101.receiveTax: I receive tax credits and tax bracket against another income, therefore I'm not entitled to them against this income
form101.NoPaymentMade: No payments are made on my behalf to a Study fund from another income, or all the employer contributions made to a Study fund from another income are attached to my other income
form101.NoPaymentMadebehalf: No payments are made on my behalf to pension / loss of working capacity insurance / severance pay from another income, or all the employer contributions to pension / loss of working capacity insurance / severance pay from my other income are attached to my other income.
form101.spouseWarning: This section is only relevant if you're married.
form101.taxExemption: H. I request tax exemption or tax credit due to the following reasons
form101.disabledCertificate: Certificate from the Ministry of Defence/the Treasury/assessing officer/Certification of Blindness issued after 1/1/94.
form101.disabledCompensation: 2B. In addition, I receive a monthly compensation in accordance with Disabled Law (compensation and rehabilitation) the or the Compensation for Victims of Hostile Acts Law
form101.disabledCompensationCertificate: Certificate for receiving the monthly compensation
form101.exm3Certificate: Locality Certificate from the locality on Form 1312-Aleph
form101.exm4NoIncomeDate: I have had no income in Israel from the beginning of the tax year until the date
form101.exm4entitlemente: Someone whose period of entitlement is not continuous because of mandatory IDF service, higher studies or a period of time abroad - will refer to the assessing officer.
form101.exm5NOte: Cannot check because you did not indicate in section B that you're married.
form101.exm5disabledCirtificate: Disabled or blind certificate for the employee or the spouse.
form101.exm6Note: To be completed by a parent who lives separately and requesting tax credits for his children, who are in his custody and for which he receives child allowance from the the National Insurance Institute (according to clause 7 hereinafter) and who does not live in a shared householdwith another individual.
form101.exm7Note: To be completed by a parent in a single-parent family who receives child allowance for them, or by a married woman or by a single parent
form101.exm7NoOfChild: Number of children born in the tax year
form101.exm7NoOfChild1to5: Number of children between the ages of 1 and 5 in the tax year
form101.exm7NoOfChild6to17: Number of children between the ages of 6 and 17 in the tax year
form101.exm7NoOfChild18: Number of children or who turn 18 years old in the tax year
form101.exm8Note: To be completed by a parent (excluding a parent who has checked clause 7 above), an unmarried woman who does not have custody of her children and a single parent
form101.exm10Note: To be completed by a parent who lives apart from his children, who is not eligible for tax credits for his children, who has presented a court order ordering him to pay child support.
form101.employeepassportCopy: Photocopy of a court order for child support
form101.spouseNotReceiveTaxCredit: My spouse does not receive these tax credits. My children, for whom I request the tax credits, have no income in the year.
form101.exm11NoOfChildWithDisibility: Number of children with disability who are not yet 19 years old, for whom you receive children's disability benefit from the National Insurance Institute
form101.exm11Certificate: Children's disability benefit certificate from the National Insurance Institute for the current tax year *
form101.exm12Note: To be completed by a person who has remarried.
form101.exm12Certificate: Photocopy of a court order for alimony
form101.requestReason1: The assessing officer has approved tax coordination by the attached confirmation.
form101.requestReason2: I have additional incomes from salary as specified below.
form101.requestReason3: The assessing officer has approved tax coordination by the attached confirmation.
form101.requestReason1Certificate: Proofs for lack of previous incomes
form101.requestReason3Certificate: Tax coordination certificate from the assessing officer

validation.first_name: Enter your full first name as it appears on your identification document.
validation.last_name: Enter your full last name as it appears on your identification document.
validation.identification: Select the type of identification you are providing (e.g., ID card, passport).
validation.passport: If applicable, enter your passport number and country of issue.
validation.id_number: If applicable, enter your ID number and country of issue.
validation.photocopy_id: Attach a clear photocopy of your identification card.
validation.dob: Enter your date of birth in DD/MM/YYYY format.
validation.date_of_immigration: If you are an immigrant, enter the date of your immigration to Israel in DD/MM/YYYY format.
validation.city: Enter the city of your current residence.
validation.street: Enter the street name of your current residence.
validation.house_number: Enter the house or building number of your current residence.
validation.postal_code: Enter the postal code of your current address.
validation.Phone_Number: Enter your landline phone number, if applicable.
validation.Email: Enter your active email address for contact purposes.
validation.Start_Date_Of_Job: Enter the date you started working for your current employer in DD/MM/YYYY format.
validation.Role: Specify your current job role or position.
validation.Israeli_Resident: Indicate whether you are an Israeli resident (Yes/No).
validation.Member_Of_Kibbutz: Mark if you are a member of a kibbutz or cooperative association.
validation.Health_Fund_Number: Enter your health fund membership number, if applicable.

step1.tips_title: Tips For Filling Out The Form

The form is a reference for the employer to provide tax relief and to make tax adjustments in the calculation of the employee's salary. If there is a change in the details this must be declared within a week.

Except in the month of December, when the form can also be filled out for the next tax year and in the month of january, when the form can be filled out also for the previous tax year, for the benefit of employees who did not have time to fill out the form in time.)

safeAndGear.title: Safety And Gear Form
safeAndGear.broomIntro: We are happy that you chose to work with our company. We will do everything to ensure you are satisfied with your work, and of course, we will take care of everything you need like family.
safeAndGear.broomIntro2: The job is full-time, approximately 8 hours a day, and Fridays are optional (of course, payment is based on the schedule for that day and the actual hours worked).
safeAndGear.sfg1: Ensure that all required forms are signed and completed: signed contract, Form 101, ID or visa, and if necessary, a health declaration.
safeAndGear.sfg2: You will receive your work address via WhatsApp or the Broom Service app, along with the estimated time needed for each job.
safeAndGear.sfg3: Make sure to arrive on time to the client. If there’s a delay or any issue, please inform us.
safeAndGear.sfg4: Do not discuss with clients or in their presence the hours worked or the salary we receive, etc. Do not communicate directly with the client; always go through your manager.
safeAndGear.sfg5: Be aware that clients may have cameras/microphones in their homes. By working with us, you agree to this condition and acknowledge that these are the clients' properties and they may monitor us.
safeAndGear.sfg6: If any damage occurs by accident during work, inform us immediately so we can notify the client.
safeAndGear.sfg7: If you have any changes to your schedule for the next week, notify us of the changes by Monday of the previous week.
safeAndGear.sfg8: At the end of each workday, ensure all equipment is returned to the bag and that nothing is missing.
safeAndGear.sp1: Employees must wear closed shoes at all times.
safeAndGear.sp2: Working with chemicals such as bleach, grease removers, acid, and other strong substances requires the use of a mask and protective gloves. If you are missing equipment, inform us so we can provide it before you use these substances, and do not use them without the proper protection.
safeAndGear.sp3: Do not handle cleaning agents without gloves and a standard mask.
safeAndGear.sp4: Do not touch electricity such as sockets, electrical panels, or wires without closed shoes and only by a qualified person authorized to do so.
safeAndGear.sp5: Do not clean windows on balconies or any other windows without instructions and, if necessary, a proper safety harness.
safeAndGear.sp6: Do not pour water on walls or balconies where there is a risk of electrical hazards.
safeAndGear.sp7: Do not climb on chairs or any other object that endangers you; only use a standard ladder up to 2 meters.
safeAndGear.sp8: Do not mix any chemicals with each other.
safeAndGear.sp9: Do not lean out of windows or balconies.
safeAndGear.eq1: I {{fullname}} declare that I received the document with the attached equipment list and commit to taking care of it if it is in my possession and to return it intact at the end of my employment with the company.
safeAndGear.eq2: Additionally, I received Broom Service work shirts and a backpack.
safeAndGear.eq3: I understand that any equipment that was in my possession and was damaged or not returned in its entirety will have the cost of the item deducted from my salary on the payslip, and I give my explicit consent to this.
safeAndGear.eq4: I may also receive cleaning materials from the company as needed, and I will use them according to procedures and return them after completing the work.
safeAndGear.eq5: * Bleach, grease removers, acid, and other strong substances may only be used with the manager’s approval and according to safety instructions.
safeAndGear.eq6: * At the end of each workday, filters must be cleaned and the vacuum cleaner emptied if used.
safeAndGear.eq7: * Wet cloths and mops should be hung to dry.

manpower_safty_form.title: Absence of Claims Statement
manpower_safty_form.salutation: Broom Service L.M Ltd – Company Registration Number 515184208 (here in after referred to as: "the Company")
manpower_safty_form.subject: Subject:
manpower_safty_form.subject_title: Commitment, Confirmation of Waiver, and Release
manpower_safty_form.sub_title: I, the undersigned, {{full_name}}, ID/PASSPORT No. {{number}} Address: {{address}}, hereby declare, confirm, and undertake to you as follows:
manpower_safty_form.ms1: I am employed by {{company_name}} (here in after: 'the Employer'), which is a service contractor providing services to various clients, including your company.
manpower_safty_form.ms2: I confirm that during my employment with the Employer, I am not employed by the Company, and no employer-employee relationship has existed or will exist between me and the Company.
manpower_safty_form.ms3: Throughout my employment with the Employer, I have received and will continue to receive all payments owed to me, including salary, social benefits, and any other payments to which I am entitled.
manpower_safty_form.ms4: During my entire period of employment with the Employer, and upon termination of my employment relationship with the Employer and cessation of service provision to your Company, the Employer has paid me all outstanding payments due in connection with my work, including final settlements for vacation, convalescence pay, and severance compensation.
manpower_safty_form.ms5: I have no claims or demands against the Employer and/or the Company regarding my employment or its termination. If I ever had any claims or demands, they have been fully resolved. This includes, but is not limited to, claims for: salary, bonuses, overtime, vacation pay, pension fund contributions, study fund, convalescence pay, advance notice pay, cost-of-living adjustments, sick leave, severance pay, and any other outstanding debts.
manpower_safty_form.ms6: If I am entitled by law or agreement to additional rights beyond what I have already received, I hereby fully, irrevocably, and unconditionally waive any claims, demands, or lawsuits of any kind against you, your shareholders, managers, employees, or any related persons.
manpower_safty_form.ms7: I confirm and declare that the agreements signed between you and the service provider do not create an employer-employee relationship between your Company and myself. These agreements are made for business purposes only and do not establish an employment relationship. Accordingly, I undertake not to sue you or any of your representatives in relation to any claim arising from an employer-employee relationship.
manpower_safty_form.ms8: I confirm that my declarations, confirmations, and undertakings as stated above are irrevocable and have been made of my own free will, fully aware of all my rights as an employee under any law.
manpower_safty_form.ms9: The content of this waiver statement has been explained to me in detail, in a language I fully understand. I confirm that I accept and agree to its terms. I make this decision with a clear mind, without pressure, conditions, or coercion, knowing that I have received all my rights from the Employer.
manpower_safty_form.confirm_subject: I hereby confirm the signature of {{worker_name}} ID/passport No. {{number}} on this document after reviewing, reading, and understanding its terms and legal implications.
manpower_safty_form.name: Name: Alex Kanev,
